secondary_objectives.name: Threads of Dominion
secondary_objectives.description: At the end of each turn, score 2 VP for each Secondary Objective you have currently Bound.

special_rules.name: Bind Action
special_rules.description:
All models gain the following action:
Bind (Action): Target an objective within 1" that hasn't been Bound this turn. That objective becomes Bound until Bound by another model, or the binding model is Taken Out of Action.

secondary_objectives.name: Weight of Presence
secondary_objectives.description: At the end of each turn, score 2 VP for each Secondary Objective you control.

special_rules.name: Control
special_rules.description: A Secondary Objective is only considered controlled if a player has at least 2 Claim within 1".

secondary_objectives.name: Hollow Center
secondary_objectives.description: At the end of each turn, score 6 VP for each Secondary Objective you control.

special_rules.name: Objective Setup
special_rules.description: Remove all but the central Secondary Objective Marker from the board.

secondary_objectives.name: Fractured Reach
secondary_objectives.description: At the end of each turn, score 4 VP for each Secondary Objective you control.

special_rules.name: Objective Setup
special_rules.description: Remove the central Secondary Objective Markers from the board.

secondary_objectives.name: Ashes of Inheritance
secondary_objectives.description: At the end of the game, score 10 VP for each Secondary Objective you control.

secondary_objectives.name: Measure of Harm
secondary_objectives.description:
At the end of each turn, score 1 VP for each Secondary Objective you control
At the end of the game, score 1 Victory Point for every 5 Wounds you have inflicted on enemy models.

secondary_objectives.name: Fall of the Flamebearer
secondary_objectives.description:
At the end of each turn, score 1 VP for each Secondary Objective you control
At the end of the game, score 10 VP if the opponents Leader have been Taken Out of Action.

secondary_objectives.name: Claim the Quiet
secondary_objectives.description:
At the end of each turn, score 1 VP for each Secondary Objective you control.
Score an additional 1 VP if you controlled it at the start of the turn.

secondary_objectives.name: Fade into Control
secondary_objectives.description:
At the end of each turn, except the last turn, score 1 VP for each Primary Objective you control.
At the end of the last turn, score 3 VP for each Primary Objective you control.

secondary_objectives.name: Pulse of the Moment
secondary_objectives.description: At the end of each turn, score 10 VP if you control the Active Secondary Objective.

special_rules.name: Active Objective
special_rules.description: At the start of each turn, randomly select 1 Secondary Objective Marker to be the Active objective until the end of the turn.

secondary_objectives.name: Chains of Will
secondary_objectives.description: At the end of each turn, score 2 VP for each Secondary Objective you have currently Bound.

special_rules.name: Bind Action
special_rules.description:
All models gain the following action:
Bind (Action): Target a Secondary Objective within 1" that you Control. That objective becomes Bound until Bound by another model, or the binding model is Taken Out of Action.

secondary_objectives.name: Blooded Covenant
secondary_objectives.description:
At the end of each turn, score 3 VP for each Secondary Objective where all following statements are true:
  • The Secondary Objective is Sated
  • You control the Secondary Objective
  • The model that made the Deliver Offering Action has not been Taken Out of Action

special_rules.name: Control
special_rules.description: A Secondary Objective is only considered controlled if a player has at least 2 Claim within 1".
